welcome: Welcome to the V&R Spedition assistant bot.
welcome_driver:
Welcome, driver %s
What would you like to do?
welcome_manager:
Welcome, manager %s
What would you like to do?
register: Register to unlock the main bot features, as a Driver or Manager.
registration_accepted:driver: Your registration has been accepted! You have been assigned vehicle %s with a mileage of %d km.
registration_accepted:drivertoSA: User %s has been confirmed in the driver role!
registration_accepted:managertoSA: User %s has been confirmed in the manager role!
registration_declined:SA: Registration for user %s was not confirmed.
registration_declined:user: Your registration was not accepted. Please contact one of the managers directly, or try again.
car_question: Which vehicle are you assigning to this driver?
manager:send_doc: üìÑ Send the document you want to forward to the driver.
sendmessage: ‚úèÔ∏è Write in a single message what you want to send
manager:readdoc: ‚¨áÔ∏è Click here to read the document
manager:notes: ‚úèÔ∏è Enter notes or a description for the document:
driver:err_refuel: You can only report a refuel while on an active route. If that is the case but you are still receiving this message, contact the developer: @pinkfloydfan or @NazKan_Uk
driver:shipment_already_done: You are trying to complete a task for a route that has already been closed
driver:kilometrage: Enter the current vehicle mileage. (previous: %d km) (Accepted formats: 12345; 12,345; 12,345 km; 12,345 km)
driver:weight:
Enter the product weight
(Accepted formats: 1234.5; 1,234.5; 1234.5 kg; 1,234.5 kg; 1234 kg)
driver:attach_doc: üìÉ Send the document you want to attach, then press "Send Documents" below
driver:err_taskdone: This task is either completed or does not exist in the database. If this is not expected, contact the developer: @pinkfloydfan or @NazKan_Uk
driver:attach_pic: üì∏ Send the photos you want to attach, then press "Send Photos" below
form:add_car: Form for adding a vehicle to the Database.
form:refuel: Form for entering a fuel card refuel
VERY_BAD: Something went very wrong. If the bot stops responding to further actions ‚Äî message or call the developer: @pinkfloydfan or +447990932300
